snippet: The Red Sox had been repeatedly humiliated by their chief rival this year, but the Yankees committed four errors on Saturday night as Boston split their doubleheader with a win in game 2.
abstract: New York Yankees and the Boston Red Sox split their doubleheader with the Yankees winning the first game, 6-1, and the Red Sox taking the second, 9-5.
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox had been repeatedly humiliated by their chief rival this year, but the Yankees committed four errors on Saturday night as Boston split their doubleheader with a win in game 2.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Errors Provide Spark for Red Sox to Salvage a Split
headline.main: Yankees’ Errors Help Patchwork Sox Emerge With Split
headline.print_headline: Yankees’ Errors Help Patchwork Sox Emerge With Split
headline.content_kicker: Doubleheader: Yankees 6, Red Sox 1 | Red Sox 9, Yankees 5
headline.kicker: Yankees 6, Red Sox 1 | Red Sox 9, Yankees 5
